io.soliton.protobuf

Interface Server

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRpcServer, HttpJsonRpcServer, RpcServer

    public interface Server
    High-level formalization of the server-side of the RPC system.

    A server maintains a single ServiceGroup in which concrete Service instances are kept. Server instances are responsible for decoding method calls that are sent by a Client instance. As such, concrete implementations of clients and servers are generally coupled and must use the same protocol and transport.

    The configuration, startup and shutdown sequences of a server are delegated to implementations of this abstraction.

    Author:
    Julien Silland (julien@soliton.io)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServiceGroup serviceGroup()
      Returns the service group in which the services hosted by this server are kept.
